thread.title: 'Bike the Bridge' takes place across Ambassador Bridge
thread.title_full: 'Bike the Bridge' takes place across Ambassador Bridge

title: 'Bike the Bridge' takes place across Ambassador Bridge
text:
‘Bike the Bridge’ takes place across Ambassador Bridge By -   
DETROIT (AP) - The 6th annual “Bike the Bridge” event is taking place between the U.S. and Canada. 
Organizers say about 500 cyclists are riding across the Ambassador Bridge during Sunday’s event, which is billed as Michigan’s only international bike ride. Riders will gather in Clark Park in southwest Detroit before heading over the bridge to Windsor, Ontario. 
After crossing the bridge over the Detroit River they’ll return to the U.S. and then embark on a 20-mile ride through Detroit. They’ll wrap up with lunch at Clark Park. 
The ride is hosted by Tour de Troit. Advance registration was required for the ride due to restrictions about crossing the border. 
___
